fields.name: Elemis Superfood Facial Wash
fields.description: This cleanser is ideal for people looking for a product to combat daily grime, cleansing the skin and leaving it revitalised. Packed full of superfoods including broccoli, wheatgrass, and kale and formulated with avocado and pumpkin seed oil, this cleanser leaves the skin feeling hydrated and healthy!

fields.name: Curology The Cleanser
fields.description: This cleanser is ideal for people looking to wash away dirt and excess oil whilst not clogging the pores nor stripping the skin. With ingredients such as glycerin helping to maximise moisture levels and oat extracts providing anti-inflammatory properties, this is absolutely suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: Tatcha The Deep Cleanse Exfoliating Cleanser
fields.description: This cleanser purifies and polishes the skin by lifting away dirt and oil, exfoliates and decongests pores. With proven clinical results and key ingredients such as luffa fruit, wild rose and leopard lily, this cleanser is highly recommended by many.

fields.name: Glossier Milky Jelly Cleanser
fields.description: This cleanser provides a super gentle cleansing experience. Key conditioning ingredients include rose water, comfrey root extract, xylitol, and pro-vitamin B5 leave the skin soft and smooth.

fields.name: The Body Shop Camomile Silky Cleansing Oil
fields.description: This cleansing oil is made for removing make-up and dirt from the skin. Formulated with camomile extract, this product is gentle on the skin but effective at removing excess debris on the skin.

fields.name: Aesop Parsley Seed Anti-Oxidant Facial Toner
fields.description: This toner is suitable for a wide range of skin types and leaves the skin feeling calm, soft, and hydrated with key ingredients such as parsley seed, lavender stem, and blue chamomile

fields.name: Isntree Hyaluronic Acid Toner Plus
fields.description: This toner is focused on total hydration, containing 5 hyaluronic acids whilst also containing extracts and antioxidants such as barbedensis, Centella Asiatica, and green tea, rejuvinating dull and tired skin.

fields.name: Vilvah Milk Facial Toner
fields.description: This toner is both pore-minimising and hydrating. It gently exfoliates the skin, removing dirt and excess oil. Containing rice milk extract, glycolic acid, and earth marine water, you will notice an improvement in your skin's texture

fields.name: Vilvah Pure Teatree Water Facial Toner
fields.description: This toner is tailored towards acne-prone skin, with teatree water providing anti-bacterial benefits, preventing buildup and acne by controlling excess oil whilst also soothing irritation.

fields.name: The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner
fields.description: This toner is water-based and contains key ingredients such as glycolic acid and aloe barbadensis leaf water. Suited to all skin types, this toner targets textural irregularities, dullness, and uneven skin tone.

fields.name: St Ives Gentle Smoothing Oatmeal Scrub & Mask
fields.description: This product is a 2-in-1 - a gentle exfoliating scrub, softing and smoothing the skin and a mask to nourish the skin. Utilising walnut powder as a natural exfoliant, use of this product results in soft, fresh, glowing skin.

fields.name: Glossier Solution Exfoliating Skin Perfector
fields.description: This product is a daily exfoliator that transforms your complexion, targeting dull and dead skin. With a formulation combining the benefits of AHAs, BHAs, and PHAs, customers report reduction in blemishes and smoother, softer skin.

fields.name: Lume Illumination Mask
fields.description: This mask from Lume is based around kaolin clay and with key ingredients such as kakadu plum and aloe vera, your skin will feel detoxed, hydrated and repaired in as little as 10 minutes.

fields.name: Free Essentials Earth Pull Face Mask
fields.description: This mask from Free Essentials is based around kaolin clay and only contains three other ingredients: coffea robusta powder, bentonite, and rose petal. Handmade in the United States, your skin will feel soothed and nourished in as little as 10 minutes.

fields.name: Free Essentials Char Pull Face Mask
fields.description: This mask from Free Essentials is based around kaolin clay and only contains three other ingredients: activated charcoal powder, bentonite, and rose petal. Handmade in the United States, this mask clarifies clogged pores, absorbs excess oil, and calms irritated skin.

fields.name: The Dream Skin Clinic Pure Solution Essence
fields.description: This formulation from The Dream Skin CLinic offers powerful decongesting benefits with teatree water bringing anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties and centella asiatica extracts boosting surface hydration and collagen production resulting in a calmer yet radiant complexion.

fields.name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 Solution
fields.description: This serum contains key ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and pro-vitamin B5 to target dehydration and signs of aging. Results have shown that the skin is instantly hydrated, feels smoother and softer, and is firmer after use.

fields.name: The Ordinary AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution
fields.description: This serum is a peeling solution combining the power of AHAs and BHAs to improve skin texture, unclog pores, and target uneven skin tone. This product is only recommended to experienced users and is not recommended for those with sensitive skin.

fields.name: Minimalist Niacinamide 10% + Zinc Serum
fields.description: This serum is formulated with niacinamide and matmarine, reducing and regulating excess sebum and evening skin tone, great for those looking to target acne or blemishes. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: Minimalist Retinol 0.6% Face Serum
fields.description: This serum is formulated to retain maximum efficacy of Retinol, a super ingredient providing powerful anti-aging properties targeting fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: Curology The Moisturizer
fields.description: This moisturiser has a lightweight formula that is perfect to slot into your skincare routine. Containing key ingredients such as hyaluronic acid to hydrate the skin and glycerin to lock in the moisture levels, this product is perfect for daily hydration.

fields.name: Grown Alchemist Hydra-Repair Day Cream
fields.description: This moisturiser is extra-rich but non-greasy formulated with glycerin, vitamin E, and rosehip to hydrate the skin and leave the skin looking soft and smooth. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: -417 Mineral Aqua Perfection Face Moisturizer
fields.description: This moisturiser combines minerals with natural oils and plant extracts to maintain the skin's natural moisture, whilst providing nourishment and improving elasticity. Tailored to those with normal to dry skin.

fields.name: Sesderma Retises 0.50 Antiwrinkle Regenerative Cream Forte
fields.description: This cream is targeted towards people with mature skin and those who have previously used retinol. This formulation helps to hydrate and regenerate the skin, with proven results to reduce spots and depth of wrinkles over time.

fields.name: The Ordinary Natural Mositurizing Factors + HA
fields.description: This moisturiser is formulated with a blend of ingredients naturally found in the skin itself such as amino acids, triglycerides, urea, ceramides, and hyaluronic acid to provide immediate and lasting effects. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: Skyn & Shower Cinnamon Vanilla Bath & Shower Gel
fields.description: This shower gel is scented with cinnamon and vanilla and if gently foaming to make every shower or bath feel luxurious.

fields.name: Salt & Stone Bergamot & Hinoki Body Wash
fields.description: This body wash is packed full of ocean botanicals, antioxidants, and hydrating ingredients to soften and soothe. Featuring notes such as bergamot, grapefruit, hinoki, eucalyptus, and orange blossom.

fields.name: Mon Reale Tobacco Vanilla Shower Gel
fields.description: This shower gel is indulgence in a bottle featuring tobacco and vanilla notes to make any shower or bath feel warm and inviting.

fields.name: The Body Shop Satsuma Energising Body Polish
fields.description: This energising body polish gently scrubs away at dead skin cells, revealing a layer of soft, smooth skin beneath. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: The Body Shop Coconut Sugar Body Scrub
fields.description: This body scrub provides an intense and smoothing exfoliation to leave the skin feeling softer and nourished with moisture from the natural organic coconut oil. Perfect for those with very dry skin.

fields.name: The Body Shop Avocado Body Scrub
fields.description: This body scrub provides a rich and smoothing exfoliation to leave the skin feeling softer and smoother. Perfect for those with dry skin.

fields.name: Ameliorate Smoothing Body Exfoliant
fields.description: This body scrub exfoliates, softens skin, and smooths KP bumps while moisturising for up to 8 hours. Formulated with bamboo granules, shea and cocoa buters, and coconut oil to deeply hydrate the skin and leave it soft and smooth. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: Necessaire The Body Lotion
fields.description: This body lotion helps deeply moisturise, firm and strengthen skin. Formulated with 5 signal peptides, niacinamide, and plant oils rich in vitamins A, C, and E and omega 6 and 9, this product is clinically proven to strengthen and nourish the skin.

fields.name: Clarins Moisture-Rich Body Lotion
fields.description: This body lotion is enriched with shea butter and a blend of organic plant extracts to deeply nourish and protect the skin whilst promoting optimal hydration. Suitable for all skin types.

fields.name: Aveeno Daily Moisturising Body Lotion
fields.description: This body lotion is formulated with nourishing oats and rich emollients to strengthen and protect the skin and is clinically proven to hydrate the skin. Suitable for normal to dry skin and sensitive skin.

fields.name: Vilvah Milk Body Lotion
fields.description: This body lotion is infused with oat milk, ceramides, and olive squalane to leave all skin types soft and supple. This formula is gentle yet provides intense moisturisation.

fields.name: CeraVe Moisturising Cream
fields.description: This body lotion is a rich cream developed with dermatologists for dry to very dry skin. Containing three essential ceramides and hyaluronic acid hydrating the skin and maintaining and protecting the skin's natural barrier.

fields.name: Maui Moisture Thicken & Restore+ Bamboo Fibers Shampoo
fields.description: This shampoo is infused with bamboo fibers with castor and neem oil to strengthen and repair damaged hair, leaving it renewed and softened.

fields.name: Ashley Joy Anti Dandruff Shampoo
fields.description: This shampoo is formulated to strengthen your hair and targets dandruff and hair loss specifically using a combination of minerals, tea tree extract, and menthol.

fields.name: Ashley Joy Strength Shampoo
fields.description: This shampoo is formulated to reconstruct and revitalise dull hair using a blend of keratin, caffeine, and extracts such as garlic, nettle, and olive leaf providing protection against external factors.

fields.name: Vilvah Light Conditioner
fields.description: This conditioner is formulated with grapeseed oil and aloe vera to provide hydration and nourishment, softening and strengthening the hair whilst natural amino acids and aloe vera basil water work together to promote volume and thickness.

fields.name: Vilvah Cream Conditioner
fields.description: This conditioner is formulated with tacuma butter and broccoli oil to deeply condition, detangle, and protect hair against breakage. Targeted towards people with dry, frizzy, and damaged hair, this conditioner can also provide relief against scalp conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.

fields.name: Vilvah Nourishing Hair Mask
fields.description: This nourishing hair mask is enriched with moringa and argan oil to help repair damage caused by chemicals or the elements and restore your hair to a soft and nourished state.

fields.name: Act+ Acre Restorative Hair Mask
fields.description: This is a repairing, hydrating mask suitable for all hair types enriched with glycerin and shea butter to hydrate and restore hair, improving visible damage whilst preventing breakage.

fields.name: Vilvah Hair Growth Oil
fields.description: A crafted blend of oils including pumpkin seed, kalonji, and castor to strengthen existing hair, promote hair follicle growth, reduce hair fall, and aids in reversing balding.
